name: Modules.Nfc.TagTechnologyNfcA
summary: Provides access to NFC-A (ISO 14443-3A) properties and I/O operations on a Modules.Nfc.NfcTag.

methods.name: getAtqa
methods.summary: Return the ATQA/SENS_RES bytes from tag discovery.

methods.name: getMaxTransceiveLength
methods.summary: Return the maximum number of bytes that can be sent with transceive.

methods.name: getSak
methods.summary: Return the SAK/SEL_RES bytes from tag discovery.

methods.name: transceive
methods.summary: Send raw NFC-A commands to the tag and receive the response.
